```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)


```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

ny_noaa_df = 
  ny_noaa %>% 
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
    prcp = prcp / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10,
    tmin = tmin / 10
  ) 
```

### Scatter

```{r}
ny_noaa_df %>%
  filter(id == c("USC00300766", "USC00300183", "USC00300961")) %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Precipiitation(mm):", prcp, " Snowfall(mm):", snow)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~ date, y = ~ tmax, color = ~ id, text = ~ text_label, alpha = .5, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", colors = "viridis")
```
